summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to Robert Glassman, notifying him that Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys intend to file a new bail application. The email provides advance notice and offers to keep the recipient updated.

persons.name: Robert Glassman
persons.context: Addressed as the primary recipient of an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's upcoming bail application.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, whose attorneys are preparing to file a new bail application.

connections.description: Glassman is being formally notified by a prosecutor about legal proceedings (bail application) concerning Maxwell.

events.title: Notification of Intent to File Bail Application
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails Robert Glassman to inform him that Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys intend to file a new bail application.

locations.context: Office address of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team was preparing a new bail application as of December 2, 2020.
The notification came from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, indicating ongoing federal prosecution.
Robert Glassman was a party being kept informed of procedural developments in Maxwell's case.
